name: Pyramid Intervals
description: Progressive interval training that builds up in duration, then back down: 1-2-3-2-1 minute work intervals with equal rest

exercises.name: Pyramid Running Intervals
exercises.description: Running intervals building from 1 to 3 minutes, then back down
exercises.instructions: 1min hard, 1min easy, 2min hard, 2min easy, 3min hard, 3min easy, 2min hard, 2min easy, 1min hard. Total: 15min.

modifications.easier: Walk during easy intervals, jog during hard intervals
modifications.harder: Sprint during hard intervals, jog during easy intervals

conditions.knee_moderate: Run on soft surface, reduce intensity
conditions.ankle_moderate: Focus on even terrain, controlled pace

exercises.name: Pyramid Bike Intervals
exercises.description: Cycling intervals with progressive duration (indoor or outdoor)
exercises.instructions: 1min high resistance, 1min easy spin, 2min high, 2min easy, 3min high, 3min easy, 2min high, 2min easy, 1min high.

modifications.harder: Maximum resistance, standing climbs on hard intervals

exercises.name: Pyramid Rowing Intervals
exercises.instructions: 1min hard rowing, 1min easy, 2min hard, 2min easy, 3min hard, 3min easy, 2min hard, 2min easy, 1min hard.

modifications.easier: Reduce stroke rate, focus on form
modifications.harder: Maximum stroke rate, 2K race pace on hard intervals

conditions.lower_back_moderate: Focus on leg drive, hinge at hips not spine
conditions.knee_moderate: Reduce leg drive, focus on upper body pull

exercises.name: Pyramid Bodyweight Cardio
exercises.instructions: 1min burpees, 1min march in place, 2min high knees, 2min march, 3min jumping jacks, 3min march, 2min high knees, 2min march, 1min burpees.

modifications.easier: Step-touch instead of jumping jacks, step-back burpees
modifications.harder: Tuck jumps instead of jacks, full burpees with push-up

exercises.name: Pyramid Sprint Intervals
exercises.description: Progressive sprint efforts for advanced runners
exercises.instructions: 30s sprint, 30s walk, 1min sprint, 1min walk, 90s sprint, 90s walk, 2min sprint, 2min walk, 90s sprint, 90s walk, 1min sprint, 1min walk, 30s sprint.

modifications.easier: Reduce sprint intensity to hard run (80% effort)

conditions.hamstring_moderate: Warm up thoroughly, reduce sprint intensity
conditions.knee_moderate: Run on track or soft surface, focus on form
